column4: hey crimeboy, what was that command you gave me, for shutting down X
what im trying to do is install some nvidia drivers
that will close gnome and all open apps, but it'll let you install the nvidia drivers
what drivers are you trying to install?
some video driver... not even sure if its the right one
make sure you have all of the open source ones removed before installing the binaries, that'll lead to the "version mismatch" error. Also, comment out the DRI line.
ohhh christ, all i want is to get this scrolling undr control
no problem, I had the same issue when I first started with Linux. Be thankful you're with nvidia, other comanies don't care about *nix as much
hey Prometheum ,Linux AMD64/EM64T would be for turion64 x2?
cool, i picked the right one
